turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, look at the place and order for some pizzas from Bella Luna. Could you help me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Want to get four medium pizzas. Two of them need to be meat lover's and the other two vegetarian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium pizzas, 2 meatlovers, 2 veggie lovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and all four need to have a thick crust if you don't mind.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll add that. Your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. How long until pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
